SEARCH
Module io.jstach.ezkv.kvs
Package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs

Interface KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesProvider.ProviderContext

Enclosing interface:
KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesProvider
public static sealed interface KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesProvider.ProviderContext
A context provided to KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesProvider implementations to supply necessary dependencies and services.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    KeyValuesEnvironment
    environment()
    Retrieves the KeyValuesEnvironment for accessing system-level resources and properties.
    String
    formatParameterKey(KeyValuesResource resource, String parameterName)
    Formats a resource parameter key how it is represented as key in the parsed resource.

    Formats a KeyValuesResource into its key-value representation and applies it to a given consumer.

  • Method Details

    • environment

      KeyValuesEnvironment environment()
      Retrieves the KeyValuesEnvironment for accessing system-level resources and properties.
      Returns:
      the environment instance

    • mediaFinder

      KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder()
      Retrieves the KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder for finding media types.
      Returns:
      the media finder instance

    • variables

      Variables variables()
      Retrieves the Variables used for interpolation.
      Returns:
      the variables instance

    • requireParser

      default KeyValuesMedia.Parser requireParser(KeyValuesResource resource) throws KeyValuesMediaException
      Finds and returns a required parser for the specified KeyValuesResource. Throws an exception if no parser is found.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource for which to find a parser
      Returns:
      the parser for the resource
      Throws:
      KeyValuesMediaException - if no parser is found for the resource's media type

    • formatResource

      void formatResource(KeyValuesResource resource, BiConsumer<String,String> consumer)
      Formats a KeyValuesResource into its key-value representation and applies it to a given consumer. This method allows serializing the resource into key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to format
      consumer - the consumer to apply the formatted key-value pairs

    • formatParameterKey

      String formatParameterKey(KeyValuesResource resource, String parameterName)
      Formats a resource parameter key how it is represented as key in the parsed resource.
      Parameters:
      resource - resource to base the full parameter name on.
      parameterName - the short parameter from KeyValuesResource.parameters().
      Returns:
      FQ parameter name.
